title: Simulation Education for Wilcoxon Rank-Sum Test Based on the MACH Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts (mean, median, standard deviation) and hypothesis testing principles
context.additional_context: Training for language domain data analysts, recreating real workplace scenarios in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of the Wilcoxon rank-sum test using the four components of the MACH model (Methods, Analogies, Context, How).
Learners can apply the Wilcoxon rank-sum test to language data samples in simulation/VR environments to determine statistical significance.
Learners can explain the necessity of non-parametric tests to peers by connecting them to real-world cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
